title: Customizing Matplotlib Axes and Colorbars
description: Matplotlib is a Python library that enables the creation of static, animated, and interactive visualizations in Python. It is widely used in scientific computing, data analysis, machine learning, and more. In this lab, you will learn how to plot images using Matplotlib and how to manipulate the location of axes and colorbars.

meta.title: Customizing Matplotlib Axes and Colorbars
meta.description: Learn how to plot images using Matplotlib and manipulate the location of axes and colorbars.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, axes, python, data visualization, image plotting
